g.title: MN-24-activity-diagram

a.text: High level process of purification of the mind

g.title: Beginningless past
Purify in terms of virtue
Beginningless past->Purify in terms of virtue
has requisites for concentration?
Purify in terms of virtue->has requisites for concentration?
has requisites for concentration?->Purify in terms of virtue
Purify in terms of mind
has requisites for concentration?->Purify in terms of mind
has requisites for relinquishing views?
Purify in terms of mind->has requisites for relinquishing views?
has requisites for relinquishing views?->Purify in terms of virtue
Purify in terms of view
has requisites for relinquishing views?->Purify in terms of view
has requisites for knowing what to develop & abandon?
g.text: has requisites for knowing what to develop & abandon?

g.title: Purify in terms of view->has requisites for knowing what to develop & abandon?
has requisites for knowing what to develop & abandon?->Purify in terms of virtue
Purify in terms of overcoming perplexity
g.text: Purify in terms of overcoming perplexity

g.title: has requisites for knowing what to develop & abandon?->Purify in terms of overcoming perplexity
has requisites for a masterful practice?
g.text: has requisites for a masterful practice?

g.title: Purify in terms of overcoming perplexity->has requisites for a masterful practice?
has requisites for a masterful practice?->Purify in terms of virtue
Purify in terms of knowledge & vision of what is & is not the path
g.text: Purify in terms of knowledge & vision of what is & is not the path

g.title: has requisites for a masterful practice?->Purify in terms of knowledge & vision of what is & is not the path
has requisites for a straight-forward practice?
g.text: has requisites for a straight-forward practice?

g.title: Purify in terms of knowledge & vision of what is & is not the path->has requisites for a straight-forward practice?
has requisites for a straight-forward practice?->Purify in terms of virtue
Purify in terms of knowledge & vision of the way
g.text: Purify in terms of knowledge & vision of the way

g.title: has requisites for a straight-forward practice?->Purify in terms of knowledge & vision of the way
has requisites for higher knowledges?
Purify in terms of knowledge & vision of the way->has requisites for higher knowledges?
has requisites for higher knowledges?->Purify in terms of virtue
Purify in terms of knowledge & vision
g.text: Purify in terms of knowledge & vision

g.title: has requisites for higher knowledges?->Purify in terms of knowledge & vision
Unbinding
Purify in terms of knowledge & vision->Unbinding
Extinguishment
Unbinding->Extinguishment
